meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julie Moncrieff Patrick Brannan Kevin Friloux Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4070.

td.p: Julie Moncrieff, an office manager from Chicago, Illinois
Patrick Brannan, a senior manager from Takoma Park, Maryland
Kevin Friloux, a stockbroker from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,199)

tr.td: NEW JERSEY EXITS
BOOZE-A-PALOOZA
SHERLOCK'S ADVENTURES
FEELIN' BLUE
HANDY TRAVEL PHRASES
MOVIE CROSSWORD CLUES "G"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On Oct. 18, 1931 in West Orange the lights went out for this inventor who held over 1,000 patents')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: On Oct. 18, 1931 in West Orange the lights went out for this inventor who held over 1,000 patents
